title: New-Gen KTM 250 and 390 Duke make India debut: Specs, prices & features
description: With prices starting at Rs 2.39 lakh and Rs 3.11 lakh (ex-showroom, Delhi) respectively, these new-generation bikes bring a host of exciting updates to the Indian market and they are already turning heads with their impressive features and competitive pricing.
